column4: Research shows that twenty-nine in thirty will install breezy and ask for help. ;)
Since hoary was basically stable from the start people expect breezy to be soon. They don't realize that they just got lucky.
we need a bot like apt
i think it's the problem, that nothing's updated in hoary...so they're frustrated and trying breezy, so they have something to play. it's the gentoo phenomenon
